ConfigurationOptions.Summary: Designed for early adoption, this level provides you with the bare minimum in monitoring and infrequent performance collection.
Designed to be a step up from the test level in performance collection.
A more complete monitoring solution with frequenct performance collection.
Like Production except with performance collection every 2 minutes. Use with caution.
